income_messages:
From: c*****************1@outlook.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-15 00:09:44
SUBJECT: Advance fee scam
—
Your Approved Payment Valued: US$15,500,000.00.
We write to inform you officially that we have received and confirmed
a transfer authorization instruction from the United Nations Fund
Investigation Unit in your favor valued at US$15,500,000.00 (fifteen Million
five hundred thousand  US Dollars Only). Please note that this approved long
awaited Contract/Inheritance payment Instruction has been verified by
our Legal Department through the rightful Authorities for a smooth
Credit to your Bank account via Swift Telegraphic Wire Transfer
respectively.
As the CHAIRMAN, CITI BANK (USA) I write to
inform you that the above amount is ready to be released to you.
Kindly reconfirm your full Name, Address and Telephone Number to this email
Thank you for your anticipated cooperation, awaiting your response.
Thanks for your co-operation.
Best Regards,
 Mr. Greg Stewart.
CALL OR TEXT +1 (214 494 9730
Dear Customer Joseph Yarrow
Your personal details have been confirmed as requested. Your total sum of 15.5 Million has since been lodged in one particular Escrow Account (non-deductible account)waiting for your response so we can commence on the transaction.
I am very sorry for delaying this transaction for a long time , it wasn’t intentional, rather we have been trying our best to put things in order and get you contacted. Now, this is what is needed to get your fund conveyed down to you. We need to obtain a Clean Bill of Record Certificate CBRC from the Supreme Court here in USA. This Certificate is what will enable the release of your funds from this bank and the cost
of the Certificate as placed by the Supreme Court is US 250 After the Certificate is secured, then your fund will be conveyed to you through any payment method of your choice as listed below :
1 BANK TO BANK TRANSFER
2 ATM MASTER CARD .
We have four methods of you sending the fee for CBRC document and you are to get back to us with what ever means that is more convenient to you as listed below .
(1) WESTERN UNION
(2) MONEY GRAM
(3) BTCOIN
(4) Gift cards
NOTE: Decline any messages from any impostors or fake Financial institutions claiming to be in charge of your funds. I have been ordered to get your funds and you have to contact this well respected bank in the USA only.Don’t allow yourself to be ripped off by professional criminals who claim to offer you millions of funds.
Thanks for your co-operation.
Best Regards,
Mr. Greg Stewart.
